title: Courgette quiche with feta cheese
ingredients: ['For the pastry base', '130g plain flour', '65g butter, softened', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '20g freshly grated Parmesan cheese', 'For the topping', '1 tablespoon butter', '300g courgette', 'salt and pepper', '1 to 2 teaspoons Herbes de Provence', '2 eggs', '150g feta cheese, crumbled', '1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '100g soured cream']
